name: Stalker At Night
description:
An unknown person has terrorized you at 12 o'clock at night, that person will infiltrate your house slowly, you must survive so as not to be caught by that person

Donate to Support Our Game :D

How To Play :

- keep on eye on cctv, don't let stalker, found you

- you must survive until 6 AM

- if the stalker near front of your room, shut the light, and hide in closet

System Requirements :

OS              : Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11 (64 bit)

Graphics : Directx 10, Directx 11, Directx 12 Capable

Cpu            : x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.

Memory  : 2GB of Ram

Storage    : 1 GB available
